name: MILD WILD
description: The unique aspect of the words MILD & WILD besides the fact that they rhyme is that when written in a certain way, the words appear to mirror images of each other flipped. To stylize and emphasize the sharing of these letters I used only 1 "L" and elongated and exaggerated it's features. Another thing about these words that makes them unique and worth showcasing is that their meanings are near opposites. MILD (is gentle or kind in disposition, manners, or behavior. Also moderate in type, degree, effect, or force.) WILD (Occurring, growing, or living in a natural state; not domesticated, cultivated, or tamed.) They aren't quite opposites in the traditional sense, but I'll allow the stretch of definitions to fit my purposes here. (as if it were up to me. lol)
